properties.title: Coca-cola head quarters
PlantBottle™ packaging
properties.description:
To make one of their key ingredient they convert sugarcane from Brazil into bio-monoethylene glycol or b-MEG.
http://www.coca-cola.co.uk/faq/environment/where-does-plantbottle-material-come-from.html

properties.title: Clean water
properties.description:
They make sure the water is clean by 1) enhanced filtration (pathogenic microorganisms); 2) alkalinity reduction, if needed (taste); 3) disinfection (secondary barrier against microorganisms); 4) carbon purification (chlorine, organics for safety and taste); and 5) polishing filtration (carbon fines).
http://www.mcilvainecompany.com/cosandbev/subscriber/filtration%20news%20draft.htm

properties.title: What are the made of?
properties.address: Heidelberg Road, Johannesburg South, South Africa
properties.description:
Plantbottle is made by converting surgarcane into monoethylene glycol (MEG)
